message: Yi Sun Sin was a Korean naval commander during the Joseon Dynasty. He is remembered for his victories against the Japanese navy during the Imjin War (1592-1598). He was an incredibly skillful commander and a brilliant strategist, and his tactics of using iron-clad turtle ships and kobukson warships to overwhelm the enemy were highly effective. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest naval commanders in history and a national hero in Korea.
